headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://apis.google.com https://www.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.bcdn.se https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://*.googleusercontent.com https://*.booli.se; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://raw.githubusercontent.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.firebaseapp.com; object-src 'none';
